Romney routs Santorum in Republican primary in Ill.

Mitt Romney easily bested rival Rick Santorum in the Republican presidential primary in Illinois. (AP)

Charles Street AME Church to file for bankrupty to block foreclosure action

Members voted tonight to file for federal bankruptcy protection, heading off OneUnited Bank's plan to auction the historic congregation’s property this week. (Globe)

Pictures: World Water Day 2012

The annual international celebration of water focuses on the natural resource and food security.

Mattapan trial jury remains deadlocked

Jury members apparently couldn't convince a single juror today to agree with them on nine of the 19 charges facing two men in the 2010 case. (Boston Globe)
  • Video The Big Story: Full verdict not reached yet in trial
  • Pictures Scenes from the Mattapan massacre trial

Magazine: iPad runs 'significantly hotter'

Apple's new iPad runs hotter than the earlier model when conducting processor-intensive tasks, a test from Consumer Reports found. (Bloomberg)
  • Features of the new iPad  |  Readers' reviews

$621m payment to Raytheon withheld

The Air Force has held back the payment, citing chronic delays from the Waltham-based company to deliver an advanced air-to-air missile. (Bloomberg)
